alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 18 at 3:25AM CST until January 19 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of two tenths to three tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Kansas, Smith and Jewell Counties. In Nebraska, Thayer County. * WHEN...Until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will develop in time to impact the morning commute and continue through the evening commute. Lingering impacts into at least Thursday morning are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Please expect at least minor adjustments to later snowfall forecasts, as confidence levels in snow amounts at any given location is currently considered only medium.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
